StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: I am searching for a professional opportunity to acquire additional system and network administration engineering experience and fully utilize my talents on many new and exciting challenges that will help me grow professionally, work closely with your colleagues, and hopefully be a full company employee with this employer.

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Cesar Silie is a resident of Edison, NJ, US. He has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 15 years. During his last employment he was working as a Profile Manager at Bank Of America. Cesar has extensive knowledge of Citrix Winframe, UNIX, VMware, Citrix XenApp, TCP/IP, RAID, Sun Solaris, SMS, Provisioning, Network File System, Network Attached Storage, NIS, LAN/WAN > WAN, LAN/WAN > LAN, Domain Name Server Protocol, Cisco Switches/Routers, AD, Sonnet, SQL, SONICWAL, Router, REDUCE, PowerEdge Hardware, Perl Programming, Optical Carrier > OC-12, OSS (Operating Support Systems), OSPF (Open Shortest Path First), OSI, Novell Netware, Microsoft Visio, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Exchange Server, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Application Virtualization, Linux, LAN/WAN, Korn Shell, IBM Hardware, HP ProCurve Networking, HP Hardware, Frame Relay, Ethernet, Dynamic Host Control protocol, Dell Server Hardware, DS1, DFS, Clusters SAN Storage, BGP (Border Gateway Protocol), ATM (Asynchronous Transfer Mode). Cesar has an extensive management experience (8 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2013-03 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Profile Manager/Server Control Operation Manager at Bank Of America. Since 2009-09 for 7 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Control Manager/Server Control Operation Manager at BBVA Data Security Inc.. Since 2001-11 for 78 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a IT Manager/Server Control Operation Manager at FK IT Data Center.
